content: लंज् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (लंजति) {@--1@} To blame, censure, traduce. {@--2@} To roast, fry. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (लंजयति-ते) {@--1@} To injure, strike, kill. {@--2@} To give. {@--3@} To speak. {@--4@} To be strong or powerful. {@--5@} To dwell. {@--6@} To shine. {@--7@} To be manifest.
